summary: An Ordinance providing for the laying off, opening, extending and establishing of West 59th Street, from First Avenue Northwest to Third Avenue Northwest; providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary for the laying off, opening extending and establishing of the above named street; and for the changing and establishing of the grades and the grading and regrading of the above named street in conformity with the grades established herein, and for the necessary slopes for cuts and fills upon the property abutting on said street; and providing that the entire cost of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment on the property specially benefited in the manner provided by law.
